abusefilter-edit-builder-vars-user-mobil: Li anɛ bɛɛ li kai ye tʋmtʋm n maani gʋni ken foon la nindaan
mobile-frontend-copyright: Malisim bɛnɛ $1 ni ya'a ka'a nɛ yɛlsi'a paasɛ
mobile-frontend-editor-anon: Maligim maal ka da kpe' pʋʋgin nɛ
mobile-frontend-editor-anonwarning: Warning: Fʋ nan pʋ kpɛn'ɛɛ. Fʋ ya'a maal dɛmisa, fʋ IP zin'ig la na nie pa'al nidib woo. Ka fʋ log in or ya'a maali fʋ akaunt, dɛmisa banɛ ka fʋ maal la wʋsa na bɛnɛ fʋ tʋʋma yʋ'ʋrin nɛ nyɔɔd kanɛ wʋsa ka fʋ na paam.
mobile-frontend-editor-autocreatewarning: Warning: Fʋ pʋ kpe' li pʋʋgin nɛ. Fʋn kʋdin maliŋi maal la, akaunt na n yɛ'ɔgi tisif. [[$1|Learn more]]. Log in or create an account n ken tuoni paamid tɛnsig akaunt la kpiib nyaŋɔɔ, ka n ye suor nɛ sieba.
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-ac: Nɔkimi keŋ zug lakir sia sa'an
mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-ti: Ba yisi fʋ yi zug lakir maalig nwa ni.

mobile-frontend-editor-blocked-drawer-bo: Mukum maligi maal zug lakir sia.
Kpɛɛŋimi fʋ mɛŋ ye fʋ kpe' pʋʋgin fʋ ya'a mɔr akaunt.

mobile-frontend-editor-cancel-confirm: Fʋ sid bɔɔd ye fʋ basi fʋ maalig la?
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled: Ba gʋ'ʋ zug lakir nwa ye guoe sa'aʋŋ. [$1 view source]
mobile-frontend-editor-disabled-anon: La nar ye fʋ kpe' pʋʋgini maal zug lakir nwa.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-conflict: Gbɛliŋ, tʋʋma daan yinne maal zug lakir nwa,
mobile-frontend-editor-error-loading: Gbɛliŋ, kʋ nyaŋi vɛ'ɛg maligir la.
mobile-frontend-editor-error-preview: Gbɛliŋ, bʋngbɛliŋ sia naam vɛɛgir gɔsʋg la pʋʋgin. Maalim suguru n yɔ ka muk ya'as.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing:
By publishing changes, you agree to release your contribution under the
A ni'ed tiasa, fʋ siak ye fʋ tisi fʋ la'asʋg la $1 {{PLURAL:$2|license|licenses}} gbinin.
mobile-frontend-editor-licensing-with-te: Fʋ ya'a ni'e tiakir la paalʋ, fʋ siaki tis $1 la ka siak ye fʋ nɔki fʋ sʋŋir la tis $2 {{PLURAL:$3|license|licenses}} la gbinin.
mobile-frontend-editor-new-page-confirm: {{GENDER:$1|Are you sure you want to create}} zug lakir paal nɛ {{SITENAME}} ni?
mobile-frontend-editor-placeholder: Zin'ig nwa anɛ zaalim, an yiiga daan ye fʋ yaligi li!
mobile-frontend-editor-placeholder-new-p: {{GENDER:$1|You are creating}} zug lakir paal bɛ {{SITENAME}}!
mobile-frontend-editor-summary-placehold: Mamisʋg, maalim gʋlis gbɛliŋ, zug paasʋg la
mobile-frontend-editor-summary-request: Wala ka fʋ sʋŋi maal lak kaŋa?
mobile-frontend-editor-uploadenable: Maaalim suguru kpen'es siig yiiga ka li sʋŋ maalig.
mobile-frontend-editor-wait: Zaŋi maaligi  pa'al paalʋ, maalim suguru n gu'us.
mobile-frontend-editor-loadbasiceditor: Tiakim lɛb maalig la yiib  la ni
mobile-frontend-editor-toload: Onɛ maan la na loor nananna. Fʋ ya'a nan kpɛm nyit labaar nwa saŋa biela nya'aŋɔ, maalim suguru ka [$1 reload the page].
mf-expand-sections-description: Yaligimi zug lakir nam si'esa saŋa wusa dɔli nɛ li mɛŋ maalig.
mf-font-size-description: Maalim sɔb zi'esim bɛda tis karimig sʋŋ.
mobile-frontend-generic-404-desc: Lakir kanɛ ka fʋ ied la ti pʋ nyee lii.
mobile-frontend-generic-login-new:

kpɛ'ɛm pʋʋgini sʋŋ.

Buudi pian'ad la ka fʋ ied la pʋ bɛɛ.

mobile-frontend-opt-in-explain: {{SITENAME}} βeta anɛ su'or tisif ye fʋ kpɛ'ɛŋ tʋm tʋʋma zi'esa bama ka tisi ti nɛ laba sʋŋ
mobile-frontend-references-citation-erro: Gbɛliŋ naamya ka li tɔe tis citation nwa kpen'esʋg.
mobile-frontend-requires-mobile: Lakir nwa pʋ bɛ dɛsktɔpin la. Maalim suguru n din' foon la gɔsig nwiig la n bɛ lakir la gbinnin la.
mobile-frontend-save-error: Gbɛliŋ anɔk maaligi zien. Maalim paŋ ye fʋ ke suori tis 'ccokies' maalim suguru.
mobile-frontend-search-content-no-result: {{int:mobile-frontend-search-content}} n gɔs yee yɛlʋg nwa nie zin'ig sia.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-a-z-empty-howt: Fʋ pʋ n gɔsid lakir sia nananna. Fʋ gɔsʋg la'ad sʋŋidif ka fʋ baŋid lakir banɛ ka fʋ mɔr bɔɔdim nɛ ba. Parigim staa siig la n gɔs lakir nam.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-feed-empty: Lakir nam kai zaŋi ken nananna tiasa ni.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-purpose:
gɔsʋg la'asʋg sʋŋidi fʋ 'bookmark' lakir nam ka gɔsid tiasa tisi ba.
kpe'em pʋʋgini gɔsi li.
mobile-frontend-watchlist-signup-action:
gɔsʋg la'asʋg sʋŋidi fʋ 'bookmark' lakir nam ka gɔsid tiasa tisi ba.
yɔɔgin yir ka pin'il yinne nananna.
mobile-frontend-user-page-no-owner-page-: Fʋ pʋ mɔr tʋm-tʋm lakir nannɛ
mobile-frontend-user-page-describe-yours: Fʋ tɔn'ɛ bigisi fʋ mɛŋi dɔl nɛ $1 fʋ lakir tʋʋma ni
mobile-frontend-user-page-desired-action: Zug lakir nwa nar ye li yɔ'ɔg ka maal nɛ $1
mobile-frontend-user-page-create-user-pa: Yɔɔgin lakir ka li buon ye $1
tag-mobile_edit-description: Maalig maali nyi foon (web or app)
tag-advanced_mobile_edit-description: Tʋm-tʋm n maal maalig nɛ tɔlisʋg ziesim
mobile-frontend-search-feedback-prompt: Fʋ pʋ nye fʋn iedin siel la?
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFEnableWi: Zamisim zaŋi keŋ lakir la yɛlzug nɛ pa'alʋg gima yɛlzug la gbinin
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFLazyLoad: Nɔkim siis maa niŋ li ya'a mɔr bɔɔdim.
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFShowFirs: Gʋlʋsʋg na ɛɛti bɛ 'infoboxes' la zugin, nɔbigid tʋʋma nɛ karimig.
mobile-frontend-mobile-option-MFEnableFo: Tiesimi fʋ karimig tʋʋma la gʋlʋsʋg ziesʋg.
mw-mf-amc-description: Tɔlisʋg ziesim tisid pian'ad lakir suor na'ana, lakir yɛla, tʋm-tʋm la'ad, nɛ dɛmisa la'ad sieba.
mobile-frontend-user-pref-description: Tiakimi fʋ bɔɔdim nam, paas nɛ fʋ yɔɔsʋg nwiig, 'website' niesim, tɛn'ɛsʋg dɛmisʋg, nɛ bɛdegʋ.
mobile-frontend-amc-outreach-description: Tɔlisʋg ziesim tisid lakir nam kudima tʋʋma yaliŋ,  lakir nam gɔsʋg yʋda, nananna tiasa, nɛ foon dɛmisa la'ad sieba.
mobile-frontend-amc-outreach-enabled-mes: Suor yʋʋn bɛɛ tis tɔlisʋg ziesim. Fʋ tɔn'ɛ kpiisi li fʋ nwedisa ni.
mobile-frontend-amc-outreach-dismissed-m: Fʋ tɔn'ɛ bas suori tis tɔlisʋg ziesim saŋa kanɛ wusa fʋ nwedisa ni.
mobile-frontend-console-recruit: Zamisim bɛdegʋ zaŋi ken tinamɛ mɛ'ɛdi ti foon 'site' @ https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Special:MyLanguage/Extension:MobileFrontend
mobile-frontend-special-pages-pref: Fʋ ya'a bɛ foon ni, maalim lakir sʋma nɛ linɛ bɛɛ li gʋnnɛ ('recommended)
